ValidationRule.description: Cannot close Order Creation case as Order Created if the order number is not populated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.Name = "Order Creation", ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"), ISPICKVAL( Reason , "Order Created"),
ISBLANK( Orderz__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The case cannot be closed as Order Created if the Order field is blank.
